summary:
From an early age, I was attracted to Automobiles and technology and was curious about the inner working of objects. This curiosity motivated me to take up mechanical engineering in my bachelor. During my studies, the courses comprised of mechanical and electronic aspects. During the final year, I developed a knee interest in fields of design and material which can be reflected in my bachelor thesis. The eagerness to learn more and expand my knowledge in the field of mechanical engineering especially in design paved the way for my masters.

I have a masterâ€™s degree in Mechanical Engineering with a specialization in Design Engineering from the University of Twente. The courses and internships helped in a better understanding of design and expand my knowledge in the field. My thesis work focused on Designing grippers for collaborative robots by incorporating a set-based design approach. 

Currently, I am working as a Junior Mechanical Engineer with a focus on product design using CAD software.

projects:
[{'title': 'Design of Robotic Gripper using Design Space Exploration Tool', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'description': 'Master Graduation Assignment 
 
- Utilized an automated design synthesis software called Design Space Exploration tool (DSET) which works on Set-based design approach.
- Studied various robotic gripper configurations and carried out force and motion analysis on the robotic hand gripper.
- Acquired knowledge related to design procedure of various components that constitute a robotic gripper and developed a knowledge base in DSET. 
- Designed CAD models in Solidworks 2020 of all five different gripper configurations. 
- Formulated test cases and evaluated the tool for its applicability and efficiency in designing robotic gripper.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Abhijit ', 'last_name': 'Desai', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Mechanical Design Engineer'}]}, {'title': 'Finite Elemental Analysis of Cutting Parameters and Tool Geometry Effects on Residual Stresses.', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'description': 'Bachelor Graduation Assignment 

- Studied the influence of cutting parameters and tool geometry on residual stresses induced during orthogonal machining of Aluminium 1100 alloy (workpiece) and Tungsten carbide (tool).
- Designed CAD model of tool and workpiece using Siemens NX and carried out Finite Element Analysis for different tool geometry and cutting conditions in Ansys workbench.
- Investigated the effect and presented close-form expressions for the influence of tool geometry and machining parameters on residual stresses.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Abhijit ', 'last_name': 'Desai', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Mechanical Design Engineer'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Amar', 'last_name': 'Sankanna', 'name': None, 'headline': 'software Engineer at Accenture'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'AMRUTESH VARMA', 'last_name': 'KALLEPALLI', 'name': None, 'headline': 'SAP BASIS, SAP HANA'}]}, {'title': 'Cartilaginous Orthosis: Non-invasive treatment of osteoarthritis in the ankle joint', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'description': 'This project was undertaken as a part of Integrative Design of Biomedical Products course.

- Developed a product that could facilitate easy walking for patients with ankle osteoarthritis by considering all the rules and regulations for CE certification.
- Designed CAD models were light, modular and compact. 
- Analyzed the models for their performance and will be fabricated using 3D printing.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Abhijit ', 'last_name': 'Desai', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Mechanical Design Engineer'}]}, {'title': 'Design of Thermoplastic Composite Chassis for Automobile', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'description': 'This project was undertaken as a part of Design, Production and Material course.

-Developed a conceptual chassis design for a automobile using advanced thermoplastic reenforced carbon fibres.
-Carried out analytical calculations related to forces acting on the chassis.
-Designed a CAD model in Solidworks 2019 and conducted FEA analysis by using Ansys Workbench 2019.
-	Evaluated the design for its strength and rigidity and optimized it for low weight.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Abhijit ', 'last_name': 'Desai', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Mechanical Design Engineer'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Akhilkumar', 'last_name': 'Kollur', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Mechanical Design Engineer | Product design | Inventor automation | VBA and iLogic Programming | Power BI'}]}, {'title': 'To design compressor, heat exchanger and distillation column for carbon capture and utilization plant', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'description': 'This project was undertaken as a part of Process Equipment Design course.

- Carried out the designs for Compressor, Heat Exchanger and Distillation column to be utilized for converting carbon di oxide into Ethanol.
- Performed mechanical calculations to ensure that designed components can withstand the forces acting on them.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Abhijit ', 'last_name': 'Desai', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Mechanical Design Engineer'}]}]
